subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Brian Maddox had a 1-yard touchdown run and Stephen Garcia completed a key third-down pass in the final minutes to help visiting South Carolina beat North Carolina State, 7-3, in both teams’ season opener.
snippet: Brian Maddox had a 1-yard touchdown run and Stephen Garcia completed a key third-down pass in the final minutes to help visiting South Carolina beat North Carolina State, 7-3, in both teams’ season opener.
